text:
Question 43) A Franco-Re-Brazilian Scena: “Franco”-by the place and the characters, the place that is Paris and the characters who are pessoes of the people of great capital; "Braziliers" so ahi is drinking: Café do Brazil. The lettreiro tells the truth that this is the best of all coffees. (This page was designed especially for the Brazilian illustration by Mr. Tofani, designer of Je Sais Tout.) The early twentieth -century journal page documents an important element of French culture, which reveals the role of Brazil in the world economy, indicated in the following aspect:
A) General service provider.
B) exporter of industrial goods.
C) importer of aesthetic patterns.
D) supplier of agricultural products.
E) consumer standard trainer.
